ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen cooked meatballs, thawed
1 (12 ounce) bottle ketchup-style chili sauce (such as HeinzÂ®)
des: "This is quick and easy to prepare, don't let the sauerkraut scare you. 'Try it, you'll like it!' I My sister-in-law makes this at all of our family gatherings, and it is always sure to go!"
ins: Mix meatballs, sauerkraut, chili sauce, white sugar, brown sugar, hot water, and vinegar in a slow cooker, stirring to dissolve sugar. Cook on High for 1 hour.
